coreAttributes.name: Graphene Composite Saber
coreAttributes.description: It doesn't belong to this world, it belonged to a stranger who visited, pseudonymously known as The Rider. It seems he left it behind, every little thing about the Saber is unknown.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Slice at [npc2.name] with your Graphene Composite Saber.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(lash out)] at [npc2.name], jumping up into the air, before smashing downwards, slicing through [npc2.name], they tumble downwards from the sudden blow, but thankfully they aren't seriously injured.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Saber [npc.name] [npc.verb(end up)] grazing [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the Saber.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] but you miss, smashing your Saber into a nearby wall!
[npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to plunge the Saber into [npc2.name] but you hit air!
